title: Unlocking high-efficiency energy storage and conversion with biocompatible electrodes: the key role of interfacial interaction assembly and structural design
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00387J, Perspective
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jeongyeon Ahn, Hyeseoung Lim, Jongkuk Ko, Jinhan Cho
This perspective paper covers textile- and hydrogel-based biocompatible electrodes, and their applications for supercapacitors, biofuel cells, and actuators, focusing on the importance of interfacial interactions between electrode components.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
